Feb 3 (Reuters) -

  • AMAZON WEB SERVICES (AWS) SAYS BEST BUY SELECTS AWS AS STRATEGIC CLOUD PROVIDER

  • AWS SAYS BEST BUY HAS COMMITTED TO HIRING 1,000 NEW EMPLOYEES TO ITS TECHNOLOGY TEAM


Further company coverage: AMZN.O [BBY.N ]
